desc: 测试子查询，根据行程记录查询出差申请的案例
name: SelectTravelByTripsExists

oqls.desc: 根据行程地点查询出差申请记录
oqls.name: SelectTravelByTripsLike
oqls.oql: select applyId, applyName from Travel where trips.fromAddr like '%南京%'
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME from TRAVEL where exists (select 1 from TRAVEL_TRIP where TRAVEL_TRIP.APPLY_ID = TRAVEL_.APPLY_ID AND FROM_ADDR like '%杭州%')
